website_summaries.verdict: Wide style of football cleat that will be more comfortable for those who need extra room.
pros: Good mid-cut design to aid with ankle support
Outsole has numerous cleats to help with traction when making cuts on the edges of the shoe
Wide box will create a better fit for some players than the traditional width of shoe
cons: All sizes only offer a wide fit

customer_reviews.title: Actually wide!
customer_reviews.text: I birthed Fred Flintstone. He has seriously wide feet. He’s 7 and in an XXW. Every sports season I can’t find cleats that fit him and we end up wearing tennis shoes. He moved over to football and FINALLY I found a pair of cleats that fit and he will actually wear without complaints. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: AustinHappy

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a cleat that is truly WIDE WIDTH!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how many cleats we've been through due to my son's thick, wide foot. I've looked everywhere, stores, websites, looked up ways to lace shoes to accommodate his food width. I bought these, hoping like all the other cleats, that they would be wide enough for his foot. I'm a life time customer now! He will be wearing these for all his sports! They are PERFECT for his width of foot! He has not complained once his shoe is too tight and he can actually run throughout the entire game/practice without limping!
customer_reviews.author: joneskelsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have waited to leave feedback on these shoes so that my son (6 years old) could get some miles on them. I would not hesitate to recommend these to anyone. My boy has a very wide foot and even going up size is not a viable solution. These are visibly wider than anything I have seen in stores and have held up well over the last 6 weeks of practice and games.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: We looked far and wide for a pair of wide width cleats for my son and we found these on Amazon and just took a chance and ordered them and they have been terrific!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Go a half to 1 sz larger
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 6 year old perfect! He says they are comfortable too! The only extra wide cleats I could find at a good price and Im thankful I did! Highly recommend! I suggest getting a 1/2 to 1 sz larger than they wear. I got him 1 sz bigger and he had room to grow but not too loose.
customer_reviews.author: staceyriggleprime

customer_reviews.title: They are actually wide!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has very wide feet, and it is very difficult to fit him. These work great for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair we buy for our son. He has an extra wide foot (hulk like).
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Good wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: The toe of the shoe started separating away from the leather other than that a good wide shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 6 yo grandsons very wide feet. Stylish and sporty looking
customer_reviews.author: Pamela McGoldrick

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these and he absolutely LOVES them and loved them from the moment he put them on his ...
customer_reviews.text: I took my son to brick and mortar strores and the cleats were all too small because his feet are wider. So, I ordered these and he absolutely LOVES them and loved them from the moment he put them on his feet. They were in great shape when we received them and received exactly when we were told they would be. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Best cleats we have found
customer_reviews.text: My son is 8 and this the only cleat he has ever liked. It doesn’t squish his little toe he says... I ordered a half size up and fit great. He says they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Brandi M.

product_meta.title: zephz WideTraxx Football Cleat Youth
product_meta.description: zephz introduces the Wide Traxx Football shoe in Black/Silver. An EE Width shoe that features a shoe in Black/Silver. An EE Width shoe that features a cleated outsole with rivets.
feature_bullets: zephz introduces the Wide Traxx Football shoe in Black/Silver.
An EE Width shoe that features a synthetic upper.
Mid Cut design for ankle support.
